Quality & Safety Standards

Ensuring excellence through rigorous testing, international certifications, and unwavering commitment to quality in every protective case we manufacture.

Our Quality Process

From raw materials to finished products, every step is carefully monitored and controlled to ensure exceptional quality.

Material Testing

Rigorous testing of raw materials to ensure optimal performance and durability.

  • Chemical composition analysis
  • Mechanical property testing
  • Environmental resistance testing
  • UV stability assessment

Production Control

Continuous monitoring and control throughout the manufacturing process.

  • Real-time process monitoring
  • Statistical process control
  • Automated quality checks
  • Batch tracking and traceability

Inspection & Testing

Comprehensive inspection and testing at every stage of production.

  • Incoming material inspection
  • In-process quality checks
  • Final product testing
  • Random sampling audits

Continuous Improvement

Ongoing analysis and improvement of quality systems and processes.

  • Customer feedback analysis
  • Process optimization
  • Technology upgrades
  • Staff training programs

International Certifications

Our commitment to quality is validated by internationally recognized certifications and compliance standards.

ISO 9001:2015

Quality Management System certification ensuring consistent quality and customer satisfaction.

Valid Until: 2026

Scope: Design, development, and manufacturing of protective cases

ISO 14001:2015

Environmental Management System certification demonstrating our commitment to sustainability.

Valid Until: 2025

Scope: Environmental management in manufacturing operations

ROHS Compliance

Restriction of Hazardous Substances compliance ensuring product safety and environmental protection.

Valid Until: Ongoing

Scope: All plastic materials and components

CE Marking

European Conformity marking indicating compliance with EU safety, health, and environmental requirements.

Valid Until: Ongoing

Scope: Products sold in European Economic Area

Testing Standards

Our products undergo rigorous testing according to international standards to ensure they meet the most demanding requirements.

IP67/IP68

Ingress Protection Rating

Waterproof and dustproof testing to ensure complete protection against environmental elements.

Test Methods:

  • Dust chamber testing (8 hours)
  • Water immersion testing (30 minutes at 1m depth)
  • Pressure testing for IP68 rated products
  • Temperature cycling during exposure

MIL-STD-810G

Military Standard Testing

Comprehensive environmental testing to military specifications for extreme conditions.

Test Methods:

  • Temperature shock testing (-40°C to +60°C)
  • Vibration and shock resistance
  • Altitude and pressure testing
  • Humidity and salt spray testing

STANAG 4280

NATO Standardization Agreement

NATO standard for reusable containers ensuring military-grade protection.

Test Methods:

  • Drop testing from various heights
  • Compression and stacking tests
  • Environmental exposure testing
  • Functional testing after stress

ATA 300

Air Transport Association

Airline transport standards for shipping cases and containers.

Test Methods:

  • Vibration testing (airline transport simulation)
  • Drop and impact testing
  • Pressure differential testing
  • Temperature and humidity cycling

Safety Features

Advanced safety features designed to protect your valuable equipment in the most challenging environments.

Impact Protection

Advanced shock absorption and impact resistance to protect valuable equipment.

  • Multi-layer protection system
  • Energy-absorbing materials
  • Reinforced corner design
  • Tested to military standards

Environmental Sealing

Complete protection against water, dust, and environmental contaminants.

  • IP67/IP68 waterproof rating
  • Dust-tight construction
  • Pressure relief valve
  • Chemical resistance

Security Features

Advanced locking mechanisms and security options for valuable equipment.

  • PowerClaw latching system
  • TSA-approved locks available
  • Tamper-evident seals
  • Custom security solutions

Temperature Stability

Reliable performance across extreme temperature ranges.

  • Operating range: -40°C to +60°C
  • Thermal shock resistance
  • UV stabilized materials
  • Dimensional stability

Experience Quality You Can Trust

Ready to protect your valuable equipment with our quality-assured protective cases? Contact our quality team for detailed specifications and certifications.
